author: Yessi Bello Perez
title: Blossom Capital launches $5M angel program to invest in 20 European startups
description: Blossom Capital, an early-stage venture capital fund, is launching a €4.6 million ($5 million) angel program targeting European technology startups. Cultivate will bring together 30 angels investors — including Des Traynor (Intercom), Guillaume Pousaz (Checko…
content:
